name: Fiserv to Implement QR Crypto Payments in Argentina
description: The grotesque Saint executes the sacred weigh-in, balancing the relic of flesh against the blinding digital sphere. Analog static screams the conversion rate, sealing the pact between the peso and the phantom coin. The oily gateway is baptized in amber light, accepting the noise as payment.

Analog static screams the conversion rate, sealing the pact between the peso and the phantom coin. The oily gateway is baptized in amber light, accepting the noise as payment.
